summary: 1983  was a common year starting on Saturday of the Gregorian calendar.
full_text:
1983  was a common year starting on Saturday  of the Gregorian calendar, the 1983rd year of the Common Era  and Anno Domini  designations, the 983rd year of the 2nd millennium, the 83rd year of the 20th century, and the 4th year of the 1980s decade.
The year 1983 saw both the official beginning of the Internet and the first mobile cellular telephone call.
